Hello,
     Just a short note to all. Deepstryke, Phobia, Nightrazor, Decibel
and Tumult have all been posted on the wiki website for your viewing
pleasure. I am declaring them NPC's and can be used by anyone that
wants to play a Minion, but would prefer not to make one up. I would
suggest of course posting your intent to use one if you so desire so no
one bumps into anyone else. The only two provisions I have are: (1)
Please don't don't try to deliberately kill him or her and (2) Please
don't change his/her faction or alligience from Cyclonus.

Questions and comments are always welcome!

Enjoy!

Preston
